akas: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (original title)
Anne Burrell - Éttermi praktikák otthonra Hungary
akas from release info: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (original title)
Anne Burrell - Éttermi praktikák otthonra Hungary

1.title: The Secret to Seared Cod with Blood Orange Glaze

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Anne proves with a few tips and tricks, healthy meals can be delicious. On the menu: seared cod with a blood-orange glaze; Israeli couscous with celery, scallions and cranberries; crispy kale; and a blood-orange-and-red-onion salad.

2.title: The Secret to Grilled Skirt Steak

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Chef Burrell prepares a grilled skirt steak with herbed breadcrumbs and bagna cauda; fennel-and-fingerling confit; roasted-beet salad with pears and marcona almonds.

3.title: The Secret to Crispy Stuffed Chicken Breasts

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Chef Anne Burrell gives her secrets to making weeknight chicken. Crispy chicken breasts, stuffed with mushrooms and goat cheese, are served alongside wilted escarole with pine nuts and raisins.

4.title: The Secret to Calzones

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Anne Burrell reveals the secret to preparing perfect homemade calzones. Calzones are stuffed with broccoli rabe and sausage and served alongside roasted-garlic-asiago dip with homemade crackers.

5.title: The Secret to Seared Duck Breasts

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Give your chicken recipe a break; Anne shows duck breasts can be easy. Seared duck breasts with grape sauce, served with roasted baby carrots and parsnips with wilted radicchio.

6.title: The Secret to Arctic Char

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Anne Burrell shows how to be good to your heart, & your sweetheart. A healthful & romantic menu featuring seared Arctic char w/kumquat compote; wilted romaine salad with pears, Taleggio cheese & hazelnuts; and cinnamon-orange crème brulee.

7.title: The Secret to Pork Sausage

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Anne Burrell shows how easy it is to make her Garlic Pork Sausage at home. She also makes roasted sweet potatoes and apples; and mustard dipping sauce with horseradish and parsley.

8.title: The Secret to Veal Piccata

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot:
Know what this is about?

9.title: The Secret to Coriander Chicken with Hammered Cauliflower

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Chef Anne breathes new life into chicken with her Coriander Chicken recipe. In addition to the chicken, she also prepares hammered cauliflower; ginger ice cream; and molasses cookies.

10.title: The Secret to Asian Braised Pork Shoulder

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Chef Anne Burrell brings her favorite Asian flavors to the table. Asian braised pork shoulder is made, along with ahi poke and a pickle-cucumber-and-daikon salad.

11.title: The Secret to Pork Porterhouse

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Chef Anne Burrell shakes things up with a juicy Pork Porterhouse entrée, along with dried-fig Saba sauce and spiced carrot puree.

12.title: The Secret to Salt-Crusted Fish

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Chef Anne prepares a whole roasted fish using a tried and true technique: salt-crusted whole fish, served with grilled broccoli rabe and herbed bread pudding.

13.title: The Secret to Noodleless Butternut Squash & Pork Lasagna

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: Pasta-free lasagna? Chef Anne Burrell shows you how, with butternut-squash-and-pork lasagna, served with a simple arugula salad.

14.title: The Secret to Lamb Burgers

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

14.plot: Lamb burgers are topped with a homemade pickled-feta spread and served on whole-wheat pitas.

3.title: The Secret to Roasted Chicken

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Chef Burrell demonstrates a two-temperature technique for cooking roast chicken. Then, she whips up mashed potatoes and a beet salad.

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

episode of.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef (TV Series 2008– )

29.plot: Chef Burrell prepares a holiday feast. On the menu: crown roast of pork; chestnut-and-pear stuffing; roasted kabocha squash and haricot verts; sticky toffee pudding.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.title: Secrets of a Restaurant Chef
plot: With lessons learned through restaurant experience mixed with a pumped-up passion, Anne Burrell takes the mystery out of the professional kitchen and starts making special meals for guests, but easy enough for a rushed weekday evening.
